Discrete Mathematics

Commutative Group

DM
Jul 27, 2020

$Z_m$ is said to be commutative group because it satisfies Properties of Arithematic Modulo (for addition and multiplication modulo $m$).

Properties of Arithematic Modulo

Jul 26, 2020

Congruence

DM
Jul 24, 2020

Divisibility

DM
Jul 23, 2020

If $a$ and $b$ are integers then we say *$a$ divides $b$* if there exists an integer $c$ such that $b=ac$ and $b \over a$ is an integer.

Basic Properties of Divisiblity

DM
Jul 22, 2020

1. $if\ a | b\ and\ a|c\ then\ a|(b+c)$

Boolean Product

DM
Jul 21, 2020

Let $A=[a_{ij}]$ and $B=[b_{ij}]$ be two matrices of order $m \times k$ and $k \times n$ respectively. Then boolean product $A \odot B$ will be $A \odot B =[c_{ij}]$

Jul 20, 2020

Matrices whose entries are either 0 or 1.

Symmetric Matrix

DM
Jul 16, 2020

A square matrix is symmetric if it is equal to Transpose of Matrices i.e. $A^T = A$.
